title.b: How to Rent a MacBook Laptop, iPad Pro, and Canon Vixia HF G40 Camcorder

topic.shortdesc: So you've learned about our technology rental services and you want to move forward with renting an item (or multiple items) during your time in your AirClassroom room? Follow these simple steps to reserve our technology items through AirClassroom!

p.b: You created a profile on AirClassroom when you initially signed up to rent a classroom through our services. Log into this profile with your corresponding credentials (username & password).
Select the classroom reservation you wish to also accommodate with your rental of our technology opportunities.

Under “Additional Services,” select “Technology” from the drop-down list. Follow the page as it redirects to you to the list of available items. Choose the item, the quantity you wish to reserve, and the time for delivery.

Once everything is in order above, and your selections are made, select Submit Rental Request to complete the rental process. You will receive a same-day confirmation email to the contact information provided on your profile with the details of your technology rental and its delivery details. AirClassroom employees will provide the delivery service to your reserved classroom upon request.
